p: Lastly, the program illustrated how funding from both national programs and partners that otherwise was not directly earmarked for IDSR activities was harnessed to strengthen the program. Lack of sustainable funding of IDSR activities is the major challenge in IDSR implementation in many countries, Uganda inclusive [ 14]. The program, thus anticipated that funding for IDSR would be incorporated into the districts’ budgets, once the program’s importance and utility were appreciated by the district leadership. More-still, the WHO /IHR and the CDC global health security agenda advocate for countries to allocate a budget line at the central level to facilitate IDSR implementation which is the vehicle to implement IHR in the region [ 28].
